title: Bug 49299 - Incorrect information in Servlet 3.0 specification regarding custom cookie name and URL rewriting
description: The Servlet 3.0 chapter 7.1.1 states that a custom cookie name should affect URL rewriting. However, in the current trunk, this is not the case as the default cookie name 'jsessionid' is used instead. Attached is a war file that reproduces this issue.
OB: When deploying the war file 'cookiename.war', accessing http://localhost:8080/cookiename/ does not show the custom cookie name being used for URL rewriting.
EB: The custom cookie name specified should affect the URL rewriting process.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Deploy the attached war file 'cookiename.war' 2. Access http://localhost:8080/cookiename/
